mapper.insert: insert into daily_seat (daily_seat_id, daily_carriage_id, `row`, `col`, number, state) values (#{dailySeatId}, #{dailyCarriageId}, #{row}, #{col}, #{number}, #{state})
mapper.update: update daily_seat set state = #{state} where daily_seat_id = #{dailySeatId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from daily_seat where daily_carriage_id in (select daily_carriage_id from daily_carriage where daily_train_id = #{dailyTrainId} and type = #{type}) and state like #{pattern}
